description:
As if a flying dreadnought wasn`t surprise enough, a mysterious robed figure from the Lind Faith invites http://anidb.net/ch114628 [Arrow] beyond the wall to reveal the world`s truth, once and for all.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Is This How They Rise Up?
Kakute Karera wa Tachiagaru no ka
かくて彼らは立ち上がるのか
